data.name: 0000 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The time limit has reached zero. This is "Time Over."

data.name: 0001 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Normally the menu would appear now, and you would be presented with the options to…

data.name: 0002 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: "Retry" to start the Puzzle Part over, "Load," or "Return to title."

data.name: 0003 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: But just this once, you can continue from where you left off.

data.name: 0004 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If this were a Puzzle Part in the main story, this would be game over instead.

data.name: 0005 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: So please be careful.

data.name: 0006 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: You've run out of time this time, but for future reference...

data.name: 0007 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...here are some hints to help you achieve victory in the investigation phase.

data.name: 0008 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 1. Try to keep the Haruhi Meter as far to the right as possible.

data.name: 0009 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: By moving the Haruhi meter to the right, you can directly increase your bonus time limit.

data.name: 0010 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: In addition to that…

data.name: 0011 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …it has an effect on the Haruhi route on the top screen.

data.name: 0012 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The greater the Haruhi meter, the number and positioning of event points that allow you…

data.name: 0013 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...to delay Haruhi becomes more advantageous. So be mindful of keeping the…

data.name: 0014 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …Haruhi meter as far to the right as possible in the investeigation phase.

data.name: 0015 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 2. Acquire as many Topics as possible.

data.name: 0016 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Especially Mikuru Asahina, Yuki Nagato and Itsuki Koizumi's topics, called character topics.

data.name: 0017 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: By collecting these, you can power up the playable character or depending on the…

data.name: 0018 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …topic they are used on, can double the delay effect.

data.name: 0019 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When you use a Character Topic to Delay, you will not gain the effect of their powerup.

data.name: 0020 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: So while Investigating, think about whose topic to use in your situation...

data.name: 0021 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...and formulate a strategy. That way you will be able to…

data.name: 0022 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …maximise the use of your character topics.

data.name: 0023 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 3. Try to search as efficiently as possible.

data.name: 0024 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Overlapping your searches, or using point search on every tile...

data.name: 0025 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...will only serve to lose you time.

data.name: 0026 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Until you become more experienced, press the Y button to pause each time you Investigate...

data.name: 0027 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...and review the complete map while you think about the best action to take next.

data.name: 0028 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 4. Acquire "Main Topics."

data.name: 0029 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When an Accident occurs, the time limit is decreased dramatically.

data.name: 0030 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you acquire a Main Topic, you will be able to avoid that fundamental penalty.

data.name: 0031 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When it comes to distributing your group members, setting Kyon to be alone...

data.name: 0032 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...will allow you to acquire all of the Main Topics along that route.

data.name: 0033 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: It's generally a good idea to check each of the available main topics…

data.name: 0034 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...on each route.

data.name: 0035 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: For those saying "I can't beat it no matter what!" or "I want to progress faster!"...

data.name: 0036 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...select "Puzzle Phase" from the system settings in the config menu.

data.name: 0037 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: From there you can turn on "Topic Stock Mode."

data.name: 0038 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: In each puzzle part, you'll be able to bring in all of the usable topics that…

data.name: 0039 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...you have obtained.

data.name: 0040 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: If you play the Investigation Phase a few times and save the data, you will have plenty…

data.name: 0041 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: …of topics to bring to use in the puzzle part.

data.name: 0042 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Even if you turn "Topic Stock Mode" on...

data.name: 0043 (586.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: ...it will have no other effect on the game's content.
